name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Standing Committee of the Hangzhou Municipal People's Congress released a video announcing the unanimous approval of a resolution, which triggered collective ridicule from netizens.
One netizen commented: "Without opposition voices, it will only become more and more degenerate"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 31, a teacher surnamed Huang from the Institute of Acoustics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences reported in the work group that Yan Yonghong, a nominated academician of the Institute of Acoustics, had been committing adultery with his wife Wang for a long time, and had sex with her many times at Huang's home and in Yan's office, and sent a video of confrontation with Yan. He also said that he was threatened in the office.
Later, the teacher surnamed Huang was kicked out of the group chat, and the institute staff claimed that the above were all rumors.
According to public information, Yan Yonghong, born in March 1967, is a researcher and doctoral supervisor, director of the Key Laboratory of Language Acoustics and Content Understanding of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and deputy director of the Xinjiang Institute of Physics and Chemistry of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (on a temporary basis). He is a national candidate for the National Important Talent Project. He holds more than 40 invention patents and has published more than 200 academic papers. He is a standing director of the Chinese Acoustical Society, deputy editor-in-chief of "Applied Acoustics", and editorial board member of "Journal of Acoustics" and "Journal of Computer Science & Technology".
